text: Meta's Forward P/E Of 27 Is Still 20% Lower Than Apple And Microsoft. text: Intel: America's $8.9 Billion Stake In A Semiconductor Resurrection. Intel stock has the potential for an 18% annualized return over the next 2.25 years due to an incredibly low valuation, government oversight, and entrenched infrastructure to capitalize on. When a stock like this isn't a consensus Buy on Wall Street, that's exactly when elite capital allocators do buy, pre-inflection. That said, this thesis is going to take time. Risks are not insignificant. Management could stall on major developments and not land the crucial customers it needs to launch competitive products at scale. Hold strategically in an optionality sleeve.
